snippet: James Shields knows what this September means to the Kansas City Royals, a team that hasn't been to the playoffs since many of their players were born....

headline.print_headline: James Shields Pitches Royals Past Yankees 1-0
headline.main: James Shields Pitches Royals Past Yankees 1-0

lead_paragraph: James Shields knows what this September means to the Kansas City Royals, a team that hasn't been to the playoffs since many of their players were born.
